title: Spiced roast pheasant with pumpkin, homemade granola and bread sauce
description: You will have lots of granola leftover from this recipe which can be eaten for breakfast or used as crumble topping.
ingredients: 3 garlic cloves, 2 peeled and left whole, 1 crushed
800g/1lb 12oz pumpkin, peeled, seeds removed and sliced into wedges
pinch ground ginger or freshly grated root ginger
75g/2½oz white bread (about 3-4 slices), crusts removed, diced
